any-time-with-notice.title: Terms may be changed at any time, but you will be notified.

tosdr.case: user is notified on the day
tosdr.tldr: They can change the terms of service any time they see fit, but they will notify the user. Your use of the service supposedly constitutes acceptance of the changes in the terms.

To view a copy of this license, visit http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/3.0/ or send a letter to Creative Commons, 444 Castro Street, Suite 900, Mountain View, California, 94041, .USA
eff-back-tell-user.title: Promise to inform you about data requests from governments

tosdr.tldr: A public commitment to inform users when their data is sought by the government, unless prohibited by law. This gives you a chance to defend yourself against overreaching government demands for their data. (cc-by eff)

eff-back-transparency-data.title: Transparency on law enforcement requests

tosdr.tldr: The service is making clear to their users what standards and rules law enforcement must follow when they seek access to sensitive user data.

td68YSswb-w.title: Dropbox will notify of changes on the terms

tosdr.case: user is notified on the day
tosdr.tldr: Dropbox will notify of changes on the terms
